tool.name: MS2DeepScore Similarity
tool.description: Compute similarity scores using a pre-trained MS2DeepScore model
tool.help:
Info ==== Use a MS2DeepScore model for spectral similarity calculation. For security reasons, only ONNX models are supported to be used. If you want to use your own model, you can convert it to ONNX using the code contained in the 'MS2DeepScore Model Training' tool.
